name: Enspry Technologies
tag_list: offshore, outsource, network-testing, software-testing, testing, quality-assurance
overview:
Enspry provides software & web application testing outsourcing services. We offer software testing services with expertise in automated testing of network/telecom software and web applications. With 5+ years of automated software testing outsourcing experiences for a world-class company in “Silicon Valley” (California, USA), we can help you reduce your product development costs, cut down your time-to-market, accelerate your development productivity and increase your product quality.

Whether you are start-ups, small businesses, or Fortune 500 companies, Enspry can help establish testing strategy and process to achieve superior product quality. Our test engineers have skills and experiences in a wide variety of disciplines which can help discover bugs in your software that impact your users the most. We write automated test scripts to ensure the existing features are stable and donâ€™t inadvertently break as development progresses. We enjoy every bit of what we do. These are our key services:

Automated Testing Automated testing is the most efficient approach to increase product quality and reduce time-to-market. With our experiences, we develop automated test scripts and its infrastructure to ensure that product functionalities are stable through the software development lifecycle.

Functional Testing Functional testing helps verify that product functionality meets user expectations. No matter the product is a web-based, desktop or mobile application, our test engineers combine all best practices, methodologies, and processes to optimize test coverage to ensure that all functionalities are tested.

The basic models of our services are:

Fixed Project It is for small projects with definite timeframe and scopes. Usually, a project with timeframe ranging from a few months up to 6 months is considered to be a fixed project. It is a good option when you need a few resources to focus on certain assignments, for example writing automated scripts for a set of features, converting automated test APIs, etc.

Managed Services It is for larger projects where you need more resources to be managed. It is a good choice if you need a sustainable model because focusing on your core development and leaving testing to us can be beneficial in the long run. The team can be managed with our on-site manager who can help you track quality and productivity of deliverables. The types of works suitable for managed service are, for example, writing testcases and automated test scripts, performing failure analysis on automated test results and filing defects to your development team to resolve, etc

Is your software project in a good testing hand? Check out our services that we offer on our website www.enspry.com.

We want you to succeed, so we’ve put together our fantastic team to bring the top quality service and the excellent development productivity to reality. If you are ready to take the leap, please contact us today at info@enspry.com and weâ€™ll pull together your very own talented outsourced team.
